about_the_game:
Full 3D client online game
Cronous Online is a fully 3D MMORPG. Supports image zooming in/out, lens rotation, and height adjustment. Players can enjoy the game in a familiar environment.
Diversified career settings
The game has four initial professions to choose from, namely Warrior, Assassin, Barbarian, and Magician. Any profession can be promoted by advancing to the corresponding level. There are usually two different directions for advancement, and players can choose the gameplay that suits them based on their preferences and character positioning.
Mature social functions
Cronous has a complete community interaction system, such as chatting, dialogue, teaming, and guilds, which gives players a stronger sense of belonging. Good social relationships will make the character's growth and exploration process more exciting.
Classic battle scenes
In terms of visual expression of combat and magical effects, Cronous maximizes the continuation of classic style. In addition, the game sound will also change accordingly with the character's behavior and distance.
Guild Castle Battle
When the guild has sufficient strength, it can choose to capture the castle. After successfully occupying, the guild will receive more taxes and produce higher-level equipment. The president can set different ranks for members, and each rank will also have different guild rights.
